Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.1f62407c-c590-4f56-9021-8b7b1957400a.prompt=User Identifier 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.27c5078b-0448-4d5d-a6b6-ccc441a7e508.prompt=Artifact ID 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.62fe1498-8a49-416e-bc9e-c814d84ccca5.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.78dd46a5-f42a-43ed-bb7d-e1e88d8379c1.prompt=User Identifier 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.7938912b-7bc9-4ba2-a599-8a2fe50d2d15.prompt=User Identifier 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.7d19b236-de1e-444b-a6d8-211f8a6a72b1.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.9aca5779-fcb0-45b5-9ab9-01f544191994.prompt=Process Instance ID 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.a6511ced-ab35-4796-9110-568bb51d9614.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.c94b619a-f87f-4d2b-94c9-fbb365811526.prompt=Resource Provider ID 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.d07c3fda-84bf-4d98-8357-5d8f04aea753.prompt=Process Instance ID 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.description=
Provision a  Simple Vcenter Linux VM from a VM template. 

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.e583fa16-72f2-42a3-81e6-47aaf3abbbc2.prompt=Process Instance ID 375910f2-68a8-487f-8ab0-83ad46a2fc90.ed4eb331-3c8b-488a-8c62-7529db8ec4d4.prompt=User Identifier
flow.name: vCenter Change VM Network
